txt.en: Henbran has asked you to collect bear meat, spider chitin, and huorn branches from creatures in the Old Forest.\n\nThe Old Forest is in northern Cardolan.

DNT - 'You return! Tell me, were you able to vanquish them?'

You inform her that you did. 

'Oh thank you. Thank you! Perhaps I will sleep at last.'
'You have done it? Hee hee hee, splendid.'

'The secret is to smoke the bear meat first, over the coals of the huorn branches. Gives it a sweetness unmatched as with any other wood. And since they like to kill my chickens, this is revenge made even sweeter still.'
Henbran has tastes and cravings that are quite peculiar.
You have collected all of the items Henbran asked you to gather for her soup recipe.\n\nYou should bring them to her in the Old Forest.

'Since you shall be trapessing about the woods, you might as well help me out with a few other tasks. I want to make my favourite dish, bear meat soup, but I lack some ingredients.\n\n'Obviously, I shall need bear meat. Bring me also chopped branches from the wicked huorns and chitin from the lurkers and creepers.'
